name: Hilton Lafayette

reviews.text: This is a very nice hotel -- probably one of the nicest between Baton Rouge and Houston. I can't explain the older negative reviews except to assume the place has been completely redone since then. It's clean, the furnishings are new and tasteful, the service was professional and efficient, the restaurant was unspectacular but acceptable. One caution: They apparently allow pets, and you might want to find out in advance which floor has the barking dogs.
reviews.title: Don't hesitate to stay here..
onbusiness
reviews.text: I just stayed at the Hilton Lafayette this past week and I must say the renovation the hotel has undergone was quite impressive in comparison to some of the reviews that I read before going. The rooms were roomy and the beds were too die for! The buffet served every morning was excellend ant plenty of souther choices.

reviews.title: A WHOLE new Hotel......We LOVED it.
reviews.text: Although I didn't have much time to stay in Lafayette as business necessity warranted me to be out town often, it was by far comforting.

reviews.title: Lafayette Hilton needs renovation Bad!
reviews.text: This hotel is an older building, and was in DIRE need of a face-lift, and BOY...IT GOT ONE. NEWLY remodeled, and shinning like brand new, the new french-quarter style is attractive, and creates a very welcoming atmosphere. The new rooms are WONDERFUL and every room has a new bed that you can sink into for a good nights sleep.

reviews.title: The Hilton is average at best for the price.
reviews.text: The resturant staff was extremely friendly and helpful for our family gathering, and the lunch buffett was AWESOME.

reviews.title: You will love it....if you are a vampire!!
reviews.text: This IS the hotel in the picture, however, up close is different story. First, it is in a very, very dirty part of town. On the outside the windows look like they haven't been cleaned since 1970, and the decor is the same inside. Old, faded, and extremely CREEPY! It is NOT "charming" for a high rise to be this way, even in this part of the country. Lastly we must not forget waking up to "something" crawling next to me. If you are an Anne Rice fan, this is your hotel. If not....go to the Quality Inn right off route 10.

reviews.title: Eek!
reviews.text: Would not recommend this hotel to anyone. The hotel is in dire need of a renovation. Everything was tattered and dirty. Our room had mold/bugs/hair and other unmentionables in it. We mentioned it to the front desk and they just said arrogantly apoligized.

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.text: The lobby looks a little shabby but the rooms are nice and the service room service was very good. The people were very nice.

reviews.title: fair to middling
reviews.text: the hilton chain here in the uk means top notch properties,but this hotel was a bit tired to say the least. its time for a refurb.staff were ok and the location is fine but i suppose for 60 dollars i was maybe expecting too much.

reviews.title: Simply the Best
reviews.text: Great Service. Great price for a quality hotel. Rooms are clean and large.

description: The Hilton Lafayette hotel, winner of the prestigious Spirit of Hilton Award, is ideally located just minutes from downtown Lafayette, Lafayette Regional Airport, and the University of Lousiana-Lafayette off I-90.Our hotel offers convenient and easy access to Moore, Girard, and Pelican Park, as well as recreational activites at Rok Haus and Planet Ice. We also are minutes from local attractions such as the Mall of Acadiana, Zoo of Caadiana, McGee's Landing, and the TABASCO Plant. Our hotel aims to please both business and leisure travelers. Our guests can escape to their room which offers the Hilton Serenity package. Hotel amenities include outdoor pool with an 800 square foot deck, 24-hour fitness center, wireless Internet access, elegant ballrooms and conference rooms for groups of 5 up to 1200 people, and award-winning staff ready to cater your events. At the Hilton Lafayette, charming Southern hospitality and unsurpassed Hilton service await you.
